alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 11:11AM CST until February 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Annapolis Road on the east bank of the Black River south of Lesterville begins flooding close to this height. This is the only road directly connecting Annapolis and Lesterville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 5.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 8.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Black River Annapolis 8.0 5.7 Mon 7 pm 7.5 6.5 6.0 5.6 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
